product_name: NeutrogenaHydro Boost+ Caffeine Eye Gel Cream - Fragrance Free
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsSustainable PackagingGive BackMoisturize and reduce the look of dark circles, fine lines, and puffiness. Neutrogena Hydro Boost+ Caffeine Eye Gel Cream - Fragrance Free contains peptide complex, hyaluronic acid, and caffeine to improve the look of skin in the eye area.
details: DetailsBenefitsEye gel cream hydrates & reduces the look of dark circles, fine lines, & puffiness around the eyesKey IngredientsMoisturizing eye cream contains hyaluronic acid, an essential hydrator found naturally in skinPeptide complex helps reduce the look of dark circlesUnder eye cream with caffeine, a naturally occurring antioxidant, complements your skin's defensesFormulated WithoutFragranceParabensPhthalatesDyesItem 2601045How To UseApply a small amount in the morning and at night around the cleansed eye area and gently massage into skin. Save carton for reference.Precautions: Avoid contact with eyes--if contact occurs, rinse well with water. Keep out of reach of children. If swallowed, seek medical assistance.IngredientsWater, Glycerin, Dimethicone, Cetearyl Olivate, Caffeine, Sorbitan Olivate, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/VP Copolymer, Caprylyl Glycol, Panthenol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Dimethiconol, Acetyl Glucosamine, Sodium Hyaluronate, Steareth-20, NHydroxysuccinimide, Chrysin, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Palmitoyl Tetrapeptide-7.
how_to_use: Apply a small amount in the morning and at night around the cleansed eye area and gently massage into skin. Save carton for reference.Precautions: Avoid contact with eyes--if contact occurs, rinse well with water. Keep out of reach of children. If swallowed, seek medical assistance.

reviews.headline: no good!
reviews.comments: Im not sensitive under my eyes and when i saw this was fragrance free i was really excited but this eye cream did nothing!!!!! It didnt make me look awake or help with my dark circles and everytime i put it on my eyes would get sooo watery!

reviews.headline: Maybe the best eye gel I've tried
reviews.comments: Of late, I've relied on Clinique All About Eyes Rich cream for daytime under makeup, but I was looking for something more affordable for night. My dermatologist recommends Neutrogena Hydro Boost products and after reading the great reviews, I decided to try it. After about a week of use, I'm very happy with the results. Reduces the flaking on the outside corners of my eyes and softens the wrinkles. Have used it twice a day when I'm more dry. This looks like a new fave!

reviews.headline: Not for sensitive skin
reviews.comments: This is probably great if you dont have sensitive skin, but unfortunately it burns and stings- not only immediately when applying, but for hours afterwards if you don't wash it off.

reviews.headline: Great product!
reviews.comments: Smooths out the area under the eyes so does exactly what it says! It absorbs real quickly and easy to apply.

reviews.headline: Did not work for puffy eyes
Jury is out.
reviews.comments: I have not had enough experience with this product, but there is hope that it will live up to its claims.

reviews.headline: Would never buy again
reviews.comments: Doesn't do anything but maybe irritates the skin.

reviews.headline: Hydro Boost
reviews.comments: The eye cream burned.  I use other Neutrogena products hoping this would work; very disappointing.

reviews.headline: I regret buying this.
reviews.comments: I am generally careful what products I put near my eyes but assumed that this would be fine because Neutrogena sold this and because it was fragrance free. I was wrong. It irritates my eyes and my eyes feel like they're burning. I have never experienced this with an eye cream before. The skin around my eyes may look slightly brighter and less puffy, but my eyes look bloodshot from the irritation. Whenever I skip a day of wearing this, my eyes are fine. Don't waste your money on this.

reviews.headline: Less than Expected
reviews.comments: Firstly, when I purchased, it seemed it may have been opened and used. I went to return for another and nope, it's the same. The gel is half that small container. Be prepared to pay full price, for half the item. Disappointing

reviews.headline: eh
reviews.comments: really wanted to like this product. I'm in my 40's and have had dermatologist tell me to use a product with caffeine to help with wrinkles. saw this and thought I would give it a try. did absolutely nothing. would have given 1 star but gave 2 because it did absorb well and smelled good but didn't do anything for my fine lines.

reviews.headline: Hydrating & tightens under eyes!
reviews.comments: Love this product. I have dry skin and this is very hydrating while also taking away puffiness and droopiness under the eyes. Very effective.

reviews.headline: This is the first time using this product.
reviews.comments: I really like eye gel cream

reviews.headline: Could the container be any smaller?!
reviews.comments: I guess looking online it's hard to tell the real size.

reviews.headline: Burns terribly
reviews.comments: I never considered myself as one with sensitive skin, but this burned so badly I had to wash it off!

reviews.headline: Noticeable improvement after a few days
reviews.comments: I was pleasantly surprised that the dark bags under my eye were gone after a few days of using. I love how moisturizing it is and cooling to my skin. Would buy again!

faceoff_positive.comments:
For years I have struggled with tired-looking eyes. I have found eye creams are essential for making me look a little more alive. After trying this one, I feel like it is a great starting point for someone who may not be well-versed in skincare - I like that it is affordable! 

The packaging feels high quality except for the label and the taper-proof seal. The seal left some unsightly residue behind and the label bubbled up a bit. As someone who likes to display my skincare items for easy access, I prefer them to look nice. 

The product itself is creamy and easy to apply. No greasy residue is left behind and I had zero issues with irritation. My skin is definitely more hydrated-looking after use, and after a few weeks of use I can see slight improvement in how tired my eyes look. I wish it helped a little more with the puffiness, though!
faceoff_positive.headline: Nice introduction to eye skincare.

faceoff_negative.comments:
I struggle with puffy under eyes and was very excited to try this. I love that it had ingredients like peptide complex, hyaluronic acid, and caffeine. The eye cream is advertised to help with puffy eyes so I was excited to try it. 

This eye cream has a gel texture. It was very lightweight and felt very hydrating. It had no smell. I used this for a week straight and was disappointed to see that it did nothing for my under eye bags. I don't deal with dark circles so I can't comment on that. The one good thing about the eye cream was that it served as a good eye primer for under eye makeup up and concealer.
faceoff_negative.headline: Did not reduce puffiness

rollup.name: Hydro Boost+ Caffeine Eye Gel Cream - Fragrance Free
